array.string: Tell me about yourself
What was the toughest challenge you've ever faced?
Why do you want to work here?
Tell me about the most boring job you've ever had
Tell me about a time you had to build or motivate a team
What makes you angry?
What kind of people do you like working with?
What types of people have you found difficult to work with?
Tell me about a time you had to deal with a teammate who was underperforming
What have you learned about saying no?
What's your approach to hiriing?
Looking back, what would you do differently in life
Tell me about a time you had to use emotional intelligence
How would you design a bookcase for children?
How would you design an oven for disabled people?
How would you fix toothpaste?
How would you design an alarm clock for the blind?
How would you design a new Craigslist just for renters and landlords?
How much money does McDonalds make every year internationally?
How much money is spent on shampoo every year in the U.S.?
How many people are flying in the air at this moment?
How many reviews does Yelp get every month?
How much bandwidth is neeed to support the most popular messaging app?
How many iPhones are sold every year?
